body: Ok so, I just purchased my 2nd gold rank. I e-mailed the Support and I still haven't got my Emerald rank yet. Was wondering if some Mod could help me?That will be all, thanks!Sincerely ~Nebbae
body_tagged: Ok so, I just purchased my 2nd gold rank. I e-mailed the Support and I still haven't got my Emerald rank yet. Was wondering if some Mod could help me?That will be all, thanks!Sincerely ~Nebbae
title: Need of a Sr Mod

replies.body: I'd recommend contacting a senior mod on Skype.
replies.body_tagged: I'd recommend contacting a senior mod on Skype.

replies.body: I will pass this on to a Sr Mod or higher for you Nebbae.
replies.body_tagged: I will pass this on to a Sr Mod or higher for you Nebbae.

replies.body: Just for future reference, the best way to upgrade would be to go into the shop and put your name in the Emerald slot. it doesnt show up right away, but once you are redirected to the Buycraft portion of the purchase, the discount will show up.
replies.body_tagged: Just for future reference, the best way to upgrade would be to go into the shop and put your name in the Emerald slot. it doesnt show up right away, but once you are redirected to the Buycraft portion of the purchase, the discount will show up.
